title: Sleep | Studio
seo_title: NYC Luxury Hotel Bedding - Sleep Studio - WestHouse Hotel
seo_description: WestHouse Hotel has partnered with premier specialty sleep innovator Sleep Studio to bring guests NYC luxury hotel bedding.
contents: New York City’s own SoHo-based Sleep | Studio has developed a proprietary sleep system of bespoke mattresses uniquely designed to conform to individual body types. Boasting exceptional comfort, the indulgent and technologically advanced beds are typically available only online, but an exclusive partnership with WestHouse makes this sublime sleep experience available to guests in every Terrace Suite. Applying state-of-the-art technologies to enhance the ritual of sleep, the bedding system is designed with a 3-inch comfort top and different degrees of buoyancy, or “feels,” that adjust to different body zones to provide maximum comfort and support.
